about_the_game:
The Cosmetic Upgrade is a cosmetic package for the new Sister of the Thorn premium career for Kerillian.

All the cosmetics in the Sister of the Thorn - Cosmetic Upgrade are rewarded on purchase.

Cosmetics included:

  • 5 New Briar Javelin Illusions
  • 5 New Deepwood Staff Illusions
  • 4 New Hero Skin Color Variations
  • 3 New Hats
  • 1 New Portrait Frame
  • 6 Exclusive Keep Paintings

NOTE: When purchasing Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Sister of the Thorn Cosmetic Upgrade, you will receive 225 Shillings (in-game currency) to spend in the in-game store.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

The Cosmetic Upgrade is a cosmetic package for the new Sister of the Thorn premium career for Kerillian.

All the cosmetics in the Sister of the Thorn - Cosmetic Upgrade are rewarded on purchase.

Cosmetics included:

NOTE: When purchasing Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Sister of the Thorn Cosmetic Upgrade, you will receive 225 Shillings (in-game currency) to spend in the in-game store.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Sister of the Thorn Cosmetic Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 85 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7- 3770 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970/1060 or ATI Radeon R9 series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 85 GB available space

short_description: The Cosmetic Upgrade is a cosmetic package for the new Sister of the Thorn premium career for Kerillian. It contains new skin color variations, hats, weapon illusions and more.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
